welcomeMessage:
Welcome to GoofCord!
Set up everything to your liking, then close the settings to access Discord.
Happy chatting!
updateNotification-body: Click on the notification to open release notes
settings-encryption-unavailable: GoofCord was unable to detect a password manager. Encrypted settings will be stored in plain text. If you are on Linux, install gnome-libsecret or kwallet
opt-locale-desc: Controls the UI language of GoofCord, separate from Discord's internal language setting. Contribute translations here.
opt-discordUrl-desc: The URL loaded on launch. Prepend "canary." or "ptb." to "discord.com" to use those specific instances.
opt-arrpc-desc: Enables Rich Presence (game activity) via arRPC. Flatpak users need a workaround.
opt-minimizeToTray-desc: Keeps GoofCord running in the system tray when the window is closed.
opt-startMinimized-desc: Launches GoofCord in the background without opening a window.
opt-launchWithOsBoot-desc: Automatically starts GoofCord when you log in. Compatibility varies by Linux environment.
opt-updateNotification-desc: Show a notification when a new version of GoofCord is released.
opt-spellcheck-desc: Highlights spelling errors in text input fields.
opt-spellcheckLanguages-desc: Select languages for spellchecking. If no languages are selected, the system default is used.
opt-customTitlebar-desc: Enables an in-Discord titlebar instead of the system default.
opt-disableAltMenu-desc: Prevents the 'Alt' key from triggering the application menu bar.
opt-staticTitle-desc: Prevents Discord from changing the window title (e.g., when switching channels).
opt-dynamicIcon-desc: Displays a badge for pings/mentions on the taskbar and tray icon. Linux requires unitylib.
opt-unreadBadge-desc: Displays a dot on the icon when unread messages are present.
opt-customIconPath-desc: Load a custom image file for the application icon. Transparency recommended.
opt-trayIcon-desc: Select the tray icon style. Symbolic icons attempt to match GNOME's monochrome style.
opt-autoscroll-desc: Enables auto-scrolling with middle mouse button.
opt-popoutWindowAlwaysOnTop-desc: Forces pop-out windows to stay above other windows.
opt-transparency-desc: Allows the window to be transparent. Required for translucent themes.
opt-disableSettingsAnimations-desc: Removes transition animations within this settings menu.
opt-assets-desc:
Online scripts and styles loaded on launch. See the wiki.
- Ensure you include mod styles if they have them.
- Do not mix forks of the same mod (e.g., Vencord and Equicord).
- GoofCord requires a Vencord-based mod, PreVencord and PostVencord for full functionality.
opt-invidiousEmbeds-desc: Replaces YouTube embeds with Invidious embeds.
opt-invidiousInstance-desc: The Invidious URL to use. If videos fail to load, try setting a different instance and disabling auto-switch.
opt-autoUpdateInvidiousInstance-desc: Automatically finds and switches to the Invidious instance with the lowest latency.
opt-messageEncryption-desc: Enables message encryption support. You may need to reload twice after enabling.
opt-encryptionPasswords-desc: A list of passwords used for encryption. They are stored securely. Keep a backup in a safe location.
opt-encryptionCover-desc: A message that a user without the password will see.
opt-encryptionMark-desc: A string prepended to decrypted messages to distinguish them from normal text.
opt-domOptimizer-desc: Defers DOM updates to potentially improve performance. May cause visual artifacts.
opt-renderingOptimizations-desc: Applies CSS tweaks for smoother scrolling. Text may appear blurry with certain themes.
opt-forceDedicatedGPU-desc: Forces GoofCord to use a dedicated GPU if available.
opt-performanceFlags-desc: Enables experimental Chromium flags to boost performance. Disable if facing issues.
opt-hardwareAcceleration-desc: Uses GPU for rendering. Disable this if you experience graphical glitches.
opt-spoofChrome-desc: Emulates the Chrome web browser to better blend in with normal traffic.
opt-spoofWindows-desc: Reports the OS as Windows. Enable this if Discord blocks your connection while using a VPN on Linux.
opt-firewall-desc: Blocks known tracking and telemetry. Disable only for debugging.
opt-blocklist-desc: A list of URL patterns to block.
opt-blockedStrings-desc: Any URL containing these strings will be blocked.
opt-allowedStrings-desc: Any URL containing these strings will never be blocked (Whitelist).
opt-autoSaveCloud-desc: Automatically saves settings to the cloud when changed.
opt-cloudHost-desc: The URL for the Cloud Server. For self-hosting, see the repository.
opt-cloudEncryptionKey-desc: Used to encrypt data sent to the cloud. If lost, your data cannot be recovered. Leave empty to disable encryption and not save message encryption passwords.
opt-disableGpuCompositing-desc: May fix infinitely loading screenshare for viewers, but can also reduce performance in other areas of GoofCord.
opt-vaapi-desc: Enables the Video Acceleration API (VA-API). Mostly unsupported on Nvidia GPUs.
opt-proxy-desc: Routes Discord traffic through a specified proxy. Internal GoofCord requests (e.g., fetching external assets) will bypass this proxy.
opt-proxyRules-desc: Sets Electron proxy rules. See the Electron documentation for the schema.
opt-proxyBypassRules-desc: Sets the Electron proxy bypass rules.
